verses.1: Zedekiah in a uk a kum sawm le kum khat kum, tua kha a ni masa ni-in Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
verses.2: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Taia khuapi mite awngin hih bangin kiko uh hi. Amaute in, ‘Sumbawlna lam a i kidem pih Jerusalem khuapi zancip gawp hi. A kulhpite tu-in kihong kek a, amauteʼ guallelhna tu-in eima hauhna suak ding hi,’ ci uh hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka genin ah: Taia khuapi aw, kei pen nangma lang ka hi hi. Nangmah a sim dingin minam tampi kong paipih dinga, tuipi hualte bangin hong kuan henhan ding uh hi.
verses.4: Na kulhpite susia-in, na tausangte supai ding uh hi. Tua ciangin leitang khempeuh kiat khia-in a suangtumte bek om lai ding hi.
verses.5: Nidangin tuipi in a tup ngei suangte tungah tu-in ngasa bengte in a ngen uh pho ding uh hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in thu ka gen khin hi. Minam dangte in nang Taia khuapi hong luh gawp ding uh a,
verses.6: na gam sunga khuapi dangte sungah a teeng mi khempeuh, a namsau uh tawh that khin ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu nang Taia khuapi in na hong thei ding hi, ci hi.
verses.7: “Tua ciangin kumpi khempeuh lak panin a lian pen ahi Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar, nang Taia khuapi a sim dingin kong paipih ding hi. Amah leilu lam gam pan hong kipanin galkap honpi, sakolte le a leengte le sakol galkap honte hong tonpih ding hi.
verses.8: Gam sunga om khuapi a teeng mi khempeuh gal kidona sungah si ding uh hi. Note hong sim nadingun galte in dum to-in, phung ciangin, a kidal nadingun kulh muanhuai bawl ding uh hi.
verses.9: Amaute in molhtum tawh na kulhpite satkham ding uh a, na tausangte uh zong hei tawh phuk gawp ding uh hi.
verses.10: A sakolte uh a paina leivui khute in khuapi tuamcip ding hi. Van pua leeng le leeng galkapteʼ ginna in khuapi kulhte cimsak dinga, a kisusia sa kulh kongpi a pai bangin hong lut lel ding uh hi.
verses.11: Sakol galkapte in kongzing khempeuh tuancil gawp ding uh a, a namsau uh tawh mi khempeuh vatlum ding uh hi. Innkhuam lianpipite leilak kidenna ding hi.
verses.12: Noteʼ neihsa na hoih khempeuh, na galte un a ututin zang ding uh hi. Kulhte su pai-in inn hoih pipite sat thang gawp ding uh hi. Inn-a kizang sing le suang le na khempeuh la-in tuipi sung den nading uh hi.
verses.13: Khuapi sungah lasakna awging ka beisak dinga, tum theih awgingte khempeuh zong kiza nawn lo ding hi.
verses.14: Khuapi sungah bangmah om nawn loin, ngasa bengte in a ngen uh a pho theih nading suangtumte bek ka omsak lai ding hi. Nang Taia khuapi hong kilamkik nawn lo ding hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinta hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.15: Topa Pasian in Taia khuapi tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: “Nang hong kisimin hong kilak ni ciangin na sunga kithat miteʼ kut vengvangna in tuipi dunga teeng mite lau-in patausak ding hi.
verses.16: Tuipi a zang minamteʼ kumpite, a kumpi tokhom tung uh panin kum khia ding uh a, a kumpi puante uh le a puan hoih silhte uh suah khia-in, leilak ah tu-in, lau-in a liing ding uh hi. Nangma thuakna hong muh manun lau mahmah ding uh a, a ci-lin uh pha thei lo ding hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin nang tawh kisai-in hih bangin dah la hong phuah ding uh hi: A minthang khuapi kisia ta a, a teembawte tuipi panin maimang ta hi. Hih khuapi mite in tuipi uk ngei uh a, tuipi gei ah a teeng mi khempeuhʼ kihtak hi ngei hi.
verses.18: Tu-in hih khuapi kia ta a, tuikulh khempeuh lau-in liing uh hi. Tua bang siatna hangin tuikulh ah a teeng mite, lau-in lamdang a sa uh hi.
verses.19: “Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih bangin ka ci hi. Kuamah a ten lohna a kisia khuapi bangin a gamkhing khuapi-in kong bawl ding hi. Tuipi tuite kong tumsak ding hi.
verses.20: Tanglai-a a si sa mite tawh a teeng khawm dingin misiteʼ khua Leinuai ah kong puak ding hi. Siatna a thuak tawntung leinuai-a omte lakah kong koih dinga, a si sate tawh na om ding hi. A hingte lakah a omkik dingin tua lai panin nong kilehkik nawn kei ding hi.
verses.21: Nang pen miteʼ etteh dingin a lauhuai mahmah in kong bawl dinga, tua pen nang adingin a beina hi ta ding hi. Mite in nang hong zonzon hangun hong mu zo nawn lo ding uh hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi,” a hong ci hi.
